name: wit-kickass-fullstack-practice
description: Full-stack practice workspace with React + Express, React + FastAPI, and React + Rails

scripts.db:reset: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d postgres && sleep 5
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix react-express-app/frontend && npm run lint --prefix react-express-app/backend && npm run lint --prefix react-python-app/frontend && npm run lint --prefix react-rails-app/frontend && npm run lint --prefix dsa
